sentences.sContent: Furthermore, there are entity models created by polygon mesh in many applications such as cartoon, vision environment, network browse, physic scanning, computer games.
sentences.sContent_eng: Furthermore, there are entity models created by polygon mesh in many applications such as cartoon, vision environment, network browse, physic scanning, computer games.
sentences.sCn: 此外，在动画、虚拟环境、网络浏览、医学扫描、计算机游戏等领域已经可以看到许多由多边形网格构建的实体模型。

words.tran: [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的

trans.tranOther: a medicine or drug, esp a cathartic or purge
